title: The Shoe Troll
description: Edited by Vincent D Hammer & Vivien A. Hammer Keeping a secret can be a problem. Twisting to truth to keep that secret can be an even bigger problem.Follow the misadventures of Banchilla the Witch and her friends as they discover the value of honesty, truth and friendship.Written with young advanced readers (age 7+) in mind, this children's fantasy novel will delight readers of all ages.An excellent read-aloud book.
author: Bess Sturgis
